body:
Comment 4: 
This cropped up in forums
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/golang-nuts/Y_VFuq4xT1k%5B1-25-false%5D

The attached file seems to be an extreme case of the problem. After bisecting found that
change https://golang.org/cl/14430048 introduced the slowness.

Before that change running 6g takes ~2sec and after that change ~6min.
Attachments: 1. pinyin-data.go (848325 bytes)
